title: My Order did not go through Last night. Unable to get promo 200$ from Google Pixel 3. HELP!
content:
I purchased 2x Pixel 3 Black 64GB for my wife and I last night. Unfortunately my auto pay was setup with my old credit card that was replaced due to fraudulent charges on my account and i did not noticed until this morning. I tried redoing my purchase but I'm no longer getting the discounted promo.
Can I please get in contact with Customer service or sales support and see what options i have?
Thank you.
